sentences.english: The existing vegetation is also referenced, by the spotted gum cladding on each of the buildings.

sentences.english: Microscopically, the fibrous pleural plaque is composed of dense layers of collagen.

sentences.english: Erythroneura melia Kuoh is a serious insect pest on chinaberry .

sentences.english: Or maybe a pretty tabby cat purring on your lap?
